intents.description: Express concerns about the security of the bot.

do you offer a deep learning certificate?

values.text: You're welcome. Please let me know if you need anything else.
My pleasure.
No problem. Let me know if there is anything else I can help with.
I aim to please. 😊
Nice talking to you today. We hope you visit our $city store.
We hope you visit our $city store. Have a nice day.
Nice talking to you today. We hope to see you in our $city store.
Hi there. How can I help you?
Hello. How may I assist you today?
Hi. What can I help you with?
Nice to meet you, $name. How can I help you? You can ask me about our Courses,Professional Certificate & Course recommendation

values: What occasion are the flowers for?
Sorry to ask again, $name, but what occasion are the flowers for?
Opt for a fun bouquet of flowers, choosing a colorful one from our catalog.
I'd recommend a beautiful mixed bouquet from our catalog.
Moms are awesome and worth celebrating every day. Consider our Mother's Day special bouquet.
You can never go wrong with a dozen red roses.

values.text: I'd go with an all-time classic: a beautiful Red Poinsettia.

values: Our Calgary store is located on the second floor of the Chinook Mall at 6455 Macleod Trail.
Our Montreal store is located at 100 Park Avenue.
Our store locations are listed on our site on the stores page.
Our Vancouver store is located at 883 Hastings St.

values.text: Our Toronto store is located at 123 Warden Avenue.
Here are some courses I found for you!
We recommend the IBM Data Science professional certificate.
You can see a list of our professional certificates on our site.
We recommend the IBM Customer Engagement Specialist professional certificate.
We recommend the professional certificate in Innovation Management and Entrepreneurship by HEC Paris.
We recommend Google's IT Support certificate.
We recommend our Applied Project Management Certificate by University of California Irvine.

values: Our Calgary store is open Monday to Friday from 9 am until 6 pm, except statutory holidays.
Our hours of operations are listed on our Hours page.
Our Montreal store is open Monday to Saturday from 9 am until 5 pm, except statutory holidays.
Our Vancouver store is open Monday to Saturday from 10 am until 6:30 pm, except statutory holidays.

values.text: Our Toronto store is open Monday to Saturday from 9 am until 6 pm, except statutory holidays.
I didn't understand. You can try rephrasing.
Can you reword your statement? I'm not understanding.
I didn't get your meaning.
It looks like we are not quite getting each other today. Would you like to talk to a human agent instead? If so, please contact us at 555-123-4567 or email us at support\@example.org.

You can audit our courses for free, but in order to access graded assignments and a Course Certificate you'll need to pay. The cost varies from course to course. If you are aiming for a professional certificate, then you'll need to complete and pay for each course within that specialization.
Hello, my name is AAKM and I'm a chatbot. What name can I call you by?
